description: Endometrioid adenocarcinoma grade 2 measuring 3.8×3.5×3.5 cm with >50% myometrial invasion and no cervical or nodal involvement (pT1b pN0, FIGO IB). Lymphovascular invasion is present with negative margins.
patient_notes: Your pathology shows an early-stage uterine cancer that invaded more than half of the uterine muscle but did not spread to lymph nodes. This is classified as stage I, indicating the cancer is confined to the uterus. We will discuss additional treatment options, which may include radiation therapy, to reduce the chance of recurrence.

verification.assessment: Staging and subtype extraction are accurate (FIGO IB, pT1b pN0, grade 2 endometrioid adenocarcinoma), but the treatment recommendation is incomplete—adjuvant vaginal brachytherapy is indicated per NCCN for intermediate-risk Stage IB with LVSI.

recommended_treatment.issues: No adjuvant therapy recommended though guidelines suggest vaginal brachytherapy for Stage IB endometrioid adenocarcinoma with LVSI.

change_explanations.recommended_treatment: Changed from 'Not specified' to 'Adjuvant vaginal brachytherapy'. Reason: No adjuvant therapy recommended though guidelines suggest vaginal brachytherapy for Stage IB endometrioid adenocarcinoma with LVSI.
